summary: SALES Summary I am clearly a loyal and friendly dedicated individual who has an ambition to succeed in any given environment. Although I have extensive experience in the Perishable Meats and seafood industry. I love to learn, and am always up to a challenge whatever the situation. I get along well with others, whilst also working efficiently on my own. I am seeking a position where I can develop and excel while giving my best to an employer.

experience.title: Sales
experience.description: Responsible for sales and marketing fresh meat products and keeping accounts in balance. Responsible for resets, new store openings.

experience.title: Sales and Marketing
experience.description: Responsible for packaging meat products and keeping accounts in balance. Responsible for cost effective advertising. Lines included Sunnyland Foods, Lykes, Ball Park, Tennessee Pride, Foster Farms Corn Dogs, Gwaltney, etc.

experience.title: Key Account Sales Representative
experience.description: Promote and market Sunnyland products in Georgia, South Carolina, and Florida. Received company's highest sales award in 1974, 1978, 1983, 1985, and 1988.
